title: Automotive Starting System Diagnosis
headline: This free online course delivers the foundation information necessary to recognize and analyze starting system faults.
description: Welcome to this Alison course on 'Automotive Starting System Diagnosis’, where we demonstrate schematic diagnostic procedures step by step to teach you the possible causes of starting system malfunctions. You will therefore learn to understand the starting system's purpose and operation. In addition, you'll learn to work like a detective to quickly narrow down the possible causes of electrical faults. Register today!
courseDescription:
We have designed this automotive starting system diagnosis course to help those of all levels understand how the starting system works and how to troubleshoot potential problems. Using clear examples and concise language, Steve Liguori breaks down complex concepts into understandable pieces. He explains a process that promotes quick and accurate diagnostic results. Accordingly, those who take this course will be able to accurately diagnose problems with the starting system, narrowing down the potential causes.

While the course focuses mainly on starting system schematics, you can apply the diagnostic principles and procedures taught here to other automotive electrical systems. So, although not required to benefit from this course, and depending on your experience, we recommend that before starting this course, you first complete the 'Diagnose Basic Car Electrical Problems Using Wiring Diagrams' course.

If you are doing any work on a car, ensure you are comfortable and have hands-on skills. The course explains the foundation material necessary to understand and diagnose many basic and intermediate starting system schematics. The more you practice what we introduce in this course and apply the process to different wiring diagrams on your car, the more comfortable and proficient you will become. Let's get started!

Start Course Now
